Constructor Detail

Method Detail

init

public void init()
Description copied from class: GenericMatcher

A convenience method which can be overridden so that there's no need to call super.init(config).

Instead of overriding init(MatcherConfig), simply override this method and it will be called by GenericMatcher.init(MatcherConfig config). The MatcherConfig object can still be retrieved via getMatcherConfig().

Overrides:
init in class GenericMatcher

matchRecipient

public boolean matchRecipient(MailAddress recipient)
Description copied from class: GenericRecipientMatcher
Simple check to match exclusively on the email address (not message information).

Specified by:
matchRecipient in class GenericRecipientMatcher
Parameters:
recipient - - the address to determine whether to match
Returns:
boolean whether the recipient is a match
